mapper.insert: insert into SYS_LABEL_MAP (lab_code, target_id, target_type, rela_time) values (#{labelCode}, #{targetId}, #{targetType}, now())
mapper.delete: delete from SYS_LABEL_MAP where LAB_CODE = #{labelCode} and TARGET_ID = #{targetId} and TARGET_TYPE = #{targetType}
mapper.select: select LAB_CODE from SYS_LABEL_MAP where TARGET_TYPE = 100 and TARGET_ID = #{userId}
